paramInformation.label: LED Indication Mode
paramInformation.description: 1: show dimmer state 2 : show night mode 3: one flash mode

paramInformation.label: Restore Dimmer State
paramInformation.description: 0 : dimmer off 1 : last dimmer state 2 : dimmer on

metadata.inclusion: Press the Include button three times within 2 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press the Include button three times within 2 seconds.
metadata.reset:
1. Press the Include button three times within 2 seconds.
2. Within 1 second, press the Include button again for 5 seconds.
